name: Genius Matching - Plus
description:
Match all the cards, 2 by 2, in this Deluxe Edition.

You will enjoy 20 variants in total:
> 16 to play Solo
> 4 to play with 2 players

This game offers 4 different levels of increasing difficulty:
> Savant (28 cards to match)
> Prodigy (36 cards to match)
> Gifted (44 cards to match)
> Genius (52 cards to match)

Each level of difficulty has 4 categories:
> Shape
> Letter
> Number
> Picture

Customize your game with 25 back card set to choose from.

This game has no Ads.
